title: Market a New Condominium Development
description: A developer is launching a new condo project and needs a marketing campaign to drive pre-sales.

tasks.description: Develop a project brand, including a name, logo, and website.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete brand identity for the project is created.

tasks.description: Create high-quality 3D renderings and virtual tours of the future units and amenities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Compelling visual marketing assets are produced.

tasks.description: Launch a digital advertising campaign targeting potential buyers on social media and real estate portals to generate leads for the sales gallery.
tasks.expected_outcome: A lead generation campaign is launched and monitored.
